channel.title: Dave's linkblog feed
channel.description: My linkblog has been around in various locations for many years.

item.description: Elon Musk thinks we'll have AI smarter than any one human by next year. (Were already far beyond that.)
item.source:markdown: Elon Musk thinks we'll have AI smarter than any one human by next year. (Were already far beyond that.)

item.description: Trump's latest position on abortion tells you one thing -- they know it's a very dangerous issue for them.

item.description: Jerry Grote, Mets Catcher for 1969 World Series, Dies at 81.
item.source:markdown: Jerry Grote, Mets Catcher for 1969 World Series, Dies at 81.

item.description: Great map of Total Solar Eclipse of 2024 Apr 08. I've been looking for this for weeks. I still wasn't going to drive to see the eclipse. I've seen a total eclipse. Imho its not magical. We have an eclipse every night at sunset. YMMV of course.
item.source:markdown: Great map of Total Solar Eclipse of 2024 Apr 08\. I've been looking for this for weeks. I still wasn't going to drive to see the eclipse. I've seen a total eclipse. Imho its not magical. We have an eclipse every night at sunset. YMMV of course.

item.description: The new science of death: ‘There’s something happening in the brain that makes no sense.’

item.description: There are relatively affordable rooms in Rochester NY, which is in the path of the full eclipse.

item.description: 'Ripley' returns in black and white — and is so much better for it.
item.source:markdown: 'Ripley' returns in black and white — and is so much better for it.

item.description: House Republicans Are Amplifying Russian Propaganda. (This is hardly news. All the polling they do, wouldn't their time be better spent focusing on facts today, and forget about magic thinking and polling.)
item.source:markdown: House Republicans Are Amplifying Russian Propaganda. (This is hardly news. All the polling they do, wouldn't their time be better spent focusing on facts today, and forget about magic thinking and polling.)

item.description: Ted Turner: I bet you’re all wondering what it feels like to be a billionaire. It’s disappointing really. I’ve learned that great wealth isn’t nearly as good as average sex.
item.source:markdown: Ted Turner: I bet you’re all wondering what it feels like to be a billionaire. It’s disappointing really. I’ve learned that great wealth isn’t nearly as good as average sex.

item.description: I can't recall ever receiving spam as a result of subscribing to a podcast feed, and I have never gotten messages when I unsub begging me to come back.
item.source:markdown: I can't recall ever receiving spam as a result of subscribing to a podcast feed, and I have never gotten messages when I unsub begging me to come back.

item.description: The Washington press corps doesn’t have a freaking clue.

item.description: I imported Molly White's OPML file into FeedLand, here's the resulting feed list. Tomorrow I'll get it to display as a blogroll. Interop is the best.
item.source:markdown: I imported Molly White's OPML file into FeedLand, here's the resulting feed list. Tomorrow I'll get it to display as a blogroll. Interop is the best.

item.description: Update: Molly White's blogroll does have an OPML file. I ❤️ interop.
item.source:markdown: Update: Molly White's blogroll *does* have an OPML file. I ❤️ interop.

item.description: Electric charging on NYS Thruway. I can't imagine it can handle the traffic to and from the eclipse over the next few days.
item.source:markdown: Electric charging on NYS Thruway. I can't imagine it can handle the traffic to and from the eclipse over the next few days.

item.description: This is such a great list. I'd love to have it in OPML so I could plug it into FeedLand.

item.description: "blueskyreader" is a simple little app I put together last year, it still works, nicely, and it's an interesting idea imho. I'm not going to get to do this myself anytime soon.
